data: `minecraft:equippable` defines an entity's behavior for having items equipped to it.

data.Name: slots
data.Description: List of slots and the item that can be equipped.

data: `slots` is a list defined by six parameters. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: accepted_items
data.Description: The list of items that can go in this slot.

data.Name: interact_text
data.Description: Text to be displayed when the entity can be equipped with this item when playing with Touch-screen controls.

data.Name: item
data.Description: Identifier of the item that can be equipped for this slot.

data.Name: on_equip
data.Description: Event to trigger when this entity is equipped with this item.

data.Name: on_unequip
data.Description: Event to trigger when this item is removed from this entity.

data.Name: slot
data.Description: The slot number of this slot.
